summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Braiding Hair Pre Stretched Kanekalon Brown Easy Braiding Synthetic Braiding Hair For Braids Twists Locs Hair 24 Inch 8 Packs
Review Date: 2021/10/03
Store: Leticia
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Leticia', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches'}
Review Text: I wanted to get my daughter's hair braided for our trip. My stylist told me to get Kanekalon pre-stretched hair but I could not find the hair in any of the Sally's stores by my house. I decided to get the hair on Amazon and was not disappointed. When I got to my stylist house, she was braiding another client's hair and she compared the hair. My hair was softer and I got more hair for less than the other client. So far it still looks good even after a day at the beach. This hair does look and feel better than what I've purchased before. Definitely will buy this hair again vs going to the hair supply store.
Review Title: Just What I Needed
Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a strong preference for synthetic braiding hair, specifically highlighting Kanekalon material, which they find superior in softness and quantity compared to alternatives available at local stores. They appreciate the convenience of purchasing online, particularly when local options fall short, indicating comfort with e-commerce for specialty items. Quality is a consistent priority, as they express satisfaction with the longevity and appearance of the hair after use, reinforcing a tendency toward products that offer both durability and aesthetic appeal.

Price sensitivity emerges from their comparison of value for money; they are inclined to choose options that provide greater volume at a lower cost, enhancing their preference for affordability without compromising quality. The emotional context of the purchase, centered around preparation for a family trip, reflects a practical aspect of their shopping behavior, prioritizing products that serve specific purposes, such as braiding for an event.

Overall, this person values quality, convenience, and cost-effectiveness in their hair products, showing a consistent inclination toward specific synthetics that meet their needs for family-oriented styling.
